id.description: id of footprint - in UUID format (char36)

name.description: name of the footprint (typically can be used to help format a filename)

order.description: id of order - in UUID format (char36)

address1.description: the second line of the address for the location of the inspection

address2.description: the second line of the address for the location of the inspection

city.description: city where the inspection is located

state.description: state name of the location of the inspection

zip.description: zip code / postal code for the inspection

datetime.description: date/time of the inspection associated with this footprint

buyersagent.description: the id of the buyer's agent

sellersagent.description: the id of the seller's agent
